location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant Charles Gilmore, Commander of the HCC Teignmouth

mods.abstract: The letter is sending instructions to the Commander; he should deliver a packet to a company broker in Muscat for dispatch to Jonathan Duncan at Bombay and should then return directly to Bushire. It also advises the Commander that he should try to ascertain whether any Frenchmen are in Muscat and report any information to the Governor of Bombay.
